text: Jaume Collboni Cuadrado (; born 5 September 1969) is a Spanish politician and lawyer.Perfil de Jaume Collboni a El Debat http://www.eldebat.cat/cast/viewer.php? He became the Mayor of Barcelona on 17 June 2023. He is openly gay. Collboni married the television producer Ã“scar Cornejo in 2011. The couple separated five years later. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Barcelona Category:Spanish LGBT politicians Category:Gay men
title: Jaume Collboni
